main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

rootDir.description: Sets the rootDir for TypeScript compilation. When not defined, it uses the root of project.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

tsConfig.description: The path to the Typescript configuration file.

updateBuildableProjectDepsInPackageJson.description: Whether to update the buildable project dependencies in the build output package.json.
updateBuildableProjectDepsInPackageJson.x-deprecated: Configure the project to use the '@nx/dependency-checks' ESLint rule instead (https://nx.dev/packages/eslint-plugin/documents/dependency-checks). It will be removed in v17.

buildableProjectDepsInPackageJsonType.description: When `updateBuildableProjectDepsInPackageJson` is `true`, this adds dependencies to either `peerDependencies` or `dependencies`.
buildableProjectDepsInPackageJsonType.x-deprecated: Configure the project to use the '@nx/dependency-checks' ESLint rule instead (https://nx.dev/packages/eslint-plugin/documents/dependency-checks). It will be removed in v17.

external.description: A list projects to be treated as external. This feature is experimental

externalBuildTargets.description: List of target names that annotate a build target for a project

generateLockfile.description: Generate a lockfile (e.g. package-lock.json) that matches the workspace lockfile to ensure package versions match.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.
